office: Office of the Secretary of State
instructions: One application must be completed for each organization/employer.
lobbying_activity_date: Please indicate the actual date lobbying activity began for the current session
statement_of_non_compensation: The undersigned lobbyist and employer hereby state and affirm that neither compensation nor expenses shall be paid, incurred or received for lobbying activity during the current legislative session. Pursuant to R.I.G.L.22-10-9a5) no subsequent monthly reporting is required.
expenditures: If you have made any expenditure or incurred any obligation of $25.00 or more per occurrence to promote or oppose any legislation, including but not limited to mailings, meals, advertisements or gifts, please itemize and include the name of the receiving party and in whose behalf any such expenditure has been made, the amount, date, place and reason therefore.
